message_1: What is the plaintext of the following substitution cipher, if the key is "QWERTYUIOPASDFGHJKLZXCVBNM" and the ciphertext is "PBVRG JNFFN"?
message_2:
To decrypt the given ciphertext, we will replace each letter in the ciphertext with the corresponding letter in the standard English alphabet (A-Z) using the provided key.

The key is: QWERTYUIOPASDFGHJKLZXCVBNM
The standard English alphabet is: ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ

Ciphertext: PBVRG JNFFN

Now, we replace each letter:
P -> H
B -> E
V -> L
R -> L
G -> O
(space remains unchanged)
J -> W
N -> O
F -> R
F -> R
N -> Y

Plaintext: HELLO WORRY
